name: NewYorker
text: “This is a potential public health disaster,” an infections-disease doctor wrote, of TestUtah’s attempt to disrupt coronavirus testing in the state. A pandemic, he said, “is not the time for amateurs to learn.” https://t.co/FRvOqqslA0

name: NewYorker
text: The writer, cook, and artist Tunde Wey discusses his recent essay, “Don’t Bail Out the Restaurant Industry,” and his radical vision for a more equitable culinary world. https://t.co/nPKZnvK0KI
